context7.description: Unified documentation access for React, Redux Toolkit, Tailwind CSS, Webpack, Electron, and other web technologies. Provides up-to-date, version-specific documentation from the source.

elevenlabs.description: Official ElevenLabs MCP server for Text-to-Speech, voice cloning, audio transcription, and conversational AI integration.

n8n-mcp.description: n8n workflow automation MCP server for building and managing n8n workflows, executions, and integrations.

tailwindcss.description: Dedicated Tailwind CSS MCP server with utilities, documentation, CSS-to-Tailwind conversion, and component template generation.

chrome-devtools.description: Chrome DevTools MCP server for accessing browser console, network logs, screenshots, and debugging. Allows Claude to read DevTools console directly.
